# rafay_namespace (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rafay_namespace" "namespace" {
  projectname        = "dev1-proj"
  namespace_filepath = "/Users/sougat/Downloads/namespace-inline-values.yaml"
}
```
